title: Swift Beef Company Recalls Ground Beef Products due to Possible E. coli O157:H7 Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, Nov. 17, 2018 Swift Beef Co., a Hyrum, Utah establishment, is recalling approximately 99,260 pounds of raw non-intact ground beef products that may be contaminated with E. coli O157:H7, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The bulk...
